Blacknightmare:

"My Predacons fellows" said the femme with a smile "Just wait a 
sec "and added the femme to Silverscout "Listen me, you have the 
chance to come here and tell us what're you doing here... and maybe 
we can get an agreement... " 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>     "Ender terrorize."  He keeps his voice low so as not to be 
heard.  His 
> transformation is fairly simple and he comes out of it equiped with 
a large 
> sickle like weapon in each hand.  Very little else changes except 
that his 
> insectoid head pulls down to reveal a humanoid head.  He quietly 
attaches the 
> twin sickles two his back and draws two sidearms.  "I am ready."
